audio.narration: (excited) It's 2AM — you can triple how much you remember with one focused 20-minute ritual. (audio: soft keyboard typing, low bass pad)

storyboard.visual_style: extreme close-up of eyes over an open notebook, 85mm portrait lens, push-in micro-tracking, shallow depth of field with strong bokeh, handheld slight shake for urgency, crisp high-resolution skin and paper texture
storyboard.mood: urgent energy meets intimate warmth; dramatic chiaroscuro from a warm desk lamp against cool city-blue window lights, cinematic warmth grading, subtle film grain
storyboard.image_prompt: visual_style: extreme close-up of a student's eyes and an open notebook at a desk, 85mm portrait lens, handheld push-in micro-tracking, shallow DoF with strong bokeh. mood: urgent energy + intimate warmth with dramatic chiaroscuro lighting from a warm desk lamp and cool blue city lights outside, cinematic warmth color grade, subtle film grain, high-resolution detail. image_prompt: "Create an extreme close-up of a student's eyes and open notebook beside a warm desk lamp and cool city lights outside, 85mm portrait lens, handheld push-in micro-tracking movement, shallow depth of field, prominent bokeh, dramatic chiaroscuro lighting, cinematic warmth grading, high-resolution texture on skin and paper, professional aesthetic."

audio.narration: (confident) Tip 1 — use a condensed Pomodoro: 20 minutes focused, 5 minutes break. Set a visible timer, close tabs, silence notifications. (audio: soft timer beep, soft keyboard typing)

storyboard.visual_style: extreme close-up of a mechanical timer and hand starting it, 50mm macro lens, rack focus from timer to focused handwriting, shallow DoF, tracking shot across a tidy desk with sticky notes, crisp paper texture
storyboard.mood: professional calm with a purposeful edge; warm key light with a harder fill, cinematic cool accents, high contrast to emphasize focus
storyboard.image_prompt: visual_style: extreme close-up of a hand starting a pomodoro timer on a desk, 50mm macro lens, rack focus from timer to handwriting, shallow depth of field. mood: professional calm with warm key light and hard-edge fill, cinematic cool accents and high contrast. image_prompt: "Create an extreme close-up of a hand pressing a mechanical timer on a desk next to a notebook and pen, 50mm macro lens, rack focus from timer to handwriting, shallow DoF, tracking movement across the desk, warm desk lamp key light with hard-edge fill, cinematic cool accents, high-resolution detail, professional aesthetic, film grain."

audio.narration: (confident) Tip 2 — active recall wins. Close the book and speak the answer aloud. Use tiny flashcard intervals: review after 1 hour, then 24h, day 3, day 7. (audio: soft page turn, gentle alarm bell)

storyboard.visual_style: close-up overhead tracking shot of hands shuffling flashcards on a wooden table, 50mm lens with shallow DoF for the top card, subtle tilt and rack focus to reveal written questions and answers, natural texture detail
storyboard.mood: confident, high-clarity learning vibe; soft key light with cool rim light from a window, cinematic neutral grade, crisp contrast to highlight text
storyboard.image_prompt: visual_style: overhead close-up tracking shot of hands shuffling and flipping flashcards on a wooden table, 50mm lens, shallow DoF on the top card, rack focus to reveal question then answer. mood: confident, high-clarity study atmosphere with soft key light and cool rim light, neutral cinematic grade, crisp contrast. image_prompt: "Create an overhead close-up tracking shot of hands shuffling flashcards on a wooden table, 50mm lens, shallow depth of field with rack focus between cards, clear legible handwriting on cards, soft key light and cool rim light from a window, high-resolution detail, professional study aesthetic."

audio.narration: (confident) Tip 3 — use the Feynman technique: teach the idea in 60 seconds. If you can't explain it simply, you don't fully know it. Record yourself and listen back. (audio: soft voice recorder click)

storyboard.visual_style: medium-close handheld shot of a student speaking into a smartphone camera on a tripod, 35mm lens, push-in slowly while they gesture, shallow DoF on the face with blurred background whiteboard, subtle handheld micro movement
storyboard.mood: encouraging, intimate teaching tone; soft warm key light with a cooler fill, filmic warmth, gentle lens flare for authenticity
storyboard.image_prompt: visual_style: medium-close handheld shot of a student explaining to a smartphone camera on a tripod, 35mm lens, slow push-in, shallow depth of field with blurred whiteboard behind. mood: encouraging and intimate with soft warm key light and cool fill, gentle lens flare, cinematic warmth. image_prompt: "Create a medium-close handheld shot of a student teaching to their smartphone camera, 35mm lens, slow push-in, shallow DoF with blurred whiteboard background, natural gestures, warm key light and cool fill, subtle lens flare, high-resolution skin texture, professional education aesthetic."

audio.narration: (whispered) Tip 4 — sleep consolidates memory. If you're at 2AM, prefer a 20–90 minute nap or prioritize getting 90+ minutes of sleep soon after studying. Turn off caffeine now. (audio: low ambient pad, soft exhale)

storyboard.visual_style: gentle drone overhead tilt-down to a student closing their notebook and turning off a desk lamp, 135mm telephoto compressed perspective, slow pull-out, deep but soft focus on the figure, cinematic film grain
storyboard.mood: reassuring, hushed intimacy; soft rim light from city window, deep shadows, cool-blue grade with warm bedside lamp accent, low contrast for calm
storyboard.image_prompt: visual_style: gentle overhead tilt-down to a student closing a notebook and switching off a desk lamp, 135mm telephoto for compressed perspective, slow pull-out, soft deep focus. mood: reassuring and hushed with cool-blue grade and warm lamp accent, soft rim light, cinematic calm. image_prompt: "Create a gentle overhead tilt-down to a student closing a notebook and turning off a desk lamp, 135mm telephoto, slow pull-out movement, soft deep focus, cool-blue color grading with warm lamp accent, subtle film grain, high-resolution detail, professional calm aesthetic."

audio.narration: (excited) Try this tonight: 20-minute focus, active recall, one-minute Feynman. Comment what you tested and I'll reply with tweaks. Follow for a 2AM study hack video tomorrow. (audio: upbeat chime, soft keyboard)

storyboard.visual_style: wide tracking-out shot of hands tapping a phone screen to hit subscribe, 24mm wide-angle lens, whip-pan to a sticky note checklist, high depth detail on icons, dynamic lens flare, shallow-to-deep focus shift
storyboard.mood: high-energy call-to-action; vibrant saturation, golden rim light, cinematic punch with subtle film grain and high contrast
storyboard.image_prompt: visual_style: wide tracking-out shot of hands tapping a phone screen to press subscribe, 24mm wide-angle lens, whip-pan to a sticky-note checklist, shallow-to-deep focus shift. mood: high-energy CTA with vibrant saturation, golden rim light and cinematic punch, subtle film grain. image_prompt: "Create a dynamic wide tracking-out shot of hands tapping a phone screen to press subscribe, 24mm wide-angle lens, whip-pan to a nearby sticky-note checklist with '20/5, recall, Feynman' visible, golden rim light, vibrant color grading, lens flare, high-resolution detail, professional social media CTA aesthetic."

title: 2AM Study Routine: 4 Simple Science-Backed Hacks to Remember More
